name: Lost Player
description:
You are back in a virtual, simple and understandable world. Most likely you came to this world to relax and take a break from the real world, from everyday and boring life. But what if the virtual world is not what you think. What if unknown ghosts live in it, wandering around the virtual space and just like you looking for your place in life. Most likely you have come across such ghosts, only you know them under the name of viruses.

Viruses ...
Viruses are ghosts wandering among the virtual world.
In this game you have to face such a ghost face to face.
Good luck ...
